title: FS: 1953 Dormand Postcard Mickey Mantle - Rarer Bat on Shoulder Version - SOLD
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: FS: 1953 Dormand Postcard Mickey Mantle - Rarer Bat on Shoulder Version - SOLD
posts.post_content:
All forms of payment accepted. PM over post.

A very nice 1953 Dormand pc of Mantle w/bat on shoulder. Tougher of the 2 poses. Back has some discoloration from possible scrapbook removal.

SOLD

Thanks for looking,
Tony
I don't know that there is a better image of The Mick on any piece of cardboard. This card is early mantle, and far more rare than any standard issue. I will never understand how card values work.
